data.meta_description: A recent installation of multi chamber solar cold storage at a company dealing with organic fruits and vegetables. This allows storage of multiple commodities‚Ä¶ | 105 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
üåü NCCD Team Visit to Centre of Excellence, Kartarpur, Punjab üåü Our NCCD team recently visited the Centre of Excellence in Kartarpur, Punjab. The team included NCCD's Chief Operating Officer Sh.Asheesh Fotedar with Sh.PRITAM SARKAR and Sh.Rahul Garjola. We were there to witness the impressive 10 MT solar cold rooms installed by GiZ and Inficold at the Centre of Excellence. Accompanying us were experts in the field, Mr.Nitin Goel from Inficold and Mr.Sashi Kumar from Deutsche Gesellschaft f√ºr Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH whose insights and expertise significantly enriched our visit. These innovative solar cold rooms represent a significant step forward in sustainable cold chain solutions. After our tour, we engaged in fruitful discussions with the personnel working in the horticulture division about the further development and broader application of such technology. The potential for these solar cold rooms to revolutionize the cold chain industry, especially in the horticulture sector, is immense. We are excited about the future possibilities and collaborations that will emerge from this visit. A big thank you to everyone involved in making this visit a success! #NCCD #ColdChain #Sustainability #Horticulture #SolarColdRooms #Innovation #Collaboration #Inficold #GiZ #FutureOfColdChain

Bureau of Indian Standards and CII-IQ welcomes you join for the upcoming ‚ÄúInternational Standards Summit‚Äù where we discuss about standards ‚Äì Ensuring Excellence, Adaptation and Transformation to achieve SDG for Energy Sector on 4 and 5 July 2024 at Taj Yeshwantpur Register Now: https://lnkd.in/g28JFppe or send your nominations to mamta.rai@cii.in
